title: I dropped my phone and somehow it is now in device state locked and I cant do anything. Please help!
content: I have a google pixel 3a. And I dropped it and somehow now the phone is under phone state locked. I contacted my phone carrier but they said they think somehow my antitheft got turned on and thats why I can do anything. The power button and volume buttons work so I did a factory reset as recommended but it is still locked
